title: Meghan’s sister Samantha Markle says she didn’t call to ask if dad was okay
text:
Meghan Markle’s family criticised her for being grateful to a reporter who asked if she was ‘ok’ (Picture: Daily Mail/SOLO; CBS)

The estranged half-sister of Meghan Markle has branded the royal ‘ludicrous’ after the Duchess of Sussex opened up about the challenges of living in the media spotlight.

Samantha Markle took aim after watching the documentary Harry and Meghan: An African Journey where the Duchess was visibly thankful her interviewer checked if she was ‘ok’.

Samantha, who has been a vocal critic of Meghan, said she could not believe her sister had the ‘audacity’ and questioned whether she had checked on their father after his multiple heart attacks.

She said her father’s side of the family had not met Archie, which was ‘a dagger to her dad’s heart.’

Meghan has spoken up about the challenges of being a new mum and living under the extreme spotlight (Picture: Getty)

Meghan has had a whirlwind year with a new country, new job and new baby and told interviewer Tom Bradby it had been a challenge.

She said: ‘Any woman, especially when you’re pregnant, you’re really vulnerable. So that was made really challenging, and then when you have a new born, especially as a woman, it is a lot.

‘You add this on top of it, of just trying to be a new mom or trying to be a newlywed its…’ she pauses as if to regroup herself before continuing: ‘Yeah thank you for asking because not a lot of people have asked me if I’m okay, but it’s a very real thing to be going through behind the scenes.’

Mr Bradby on the ITV documentary then asked if it would be fair to say she was not ‘really ok’ and if it had ‘really been a struggle’?

After another pause, and looking moved by the demonstration of concern, Megan replies: ‘Yes’.

Samantha, 54, said Meghan knew what she was letting herself in for after marrying Harry at Windsor Castle in May 2018.

She told Inside Edition that Meghan ‘got what she wanted’.

Meghan Markle is getting zero sympathy from her estranged sister following the ITV special on the royals (Picture: Inside Edition)

Samantha added: ‘I think it is really ludicrous that someone who is escorted around the world by millions of dollars-worth of security on private jets as a millionaire could ever complain about anything.

‘For her to have the audacity to say something like “you know it’s nice to know that somebody wants to know if I’m okay”.

‘I thought well “wow did you ever ask dad if he was okay during two heart attacks?”’

Asked if she was being unfair to Meghan, Samantha said: ‘Telling the truth is not being mean.’

The half-sister was able to summon up enough goodwill to be positive about baby Archie calling the young prince ‘adorable’, adding: ‘He looks like Harry.’
